<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Investigate Haunting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2279) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=88)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2277)

</column>

---

You are skilled at noticing the telltale signs of ghosts and hauntings. Even when you aren't [Investigating](/Actions.aspx?ID=516) in exploration mode, you get a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) and [haunts](/Traits.aspx?ID=88) active in the area. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to disable haunts.
name: Investigate Haunting
